name: ST. ALEXIUS COLLEGE INC
about: St. Alexius College Flying School, located in Davao City, Philippines, is dedicated to providing high-quality flight education to aspiring pilots. In partnership with Davao Aeowurkz Corporation, the largest aerial spraying company in the city, the school offers world-class flight facilities and a remarkable learning environment. Committed to upholding the standards of the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines, the school aims to be the best in the country by honing the skills of future aviators. The mission is to create a conducive learning environment with state-of-the-art facilities, nurture students' skills, and prepare them to meet international aviation industry requirements. The school emphasizes quality, safety, and professionalism, ensuring students are well-prepared for their future careers in aviation.
